  • Constructor Details

    • Database

      private Database()
      The Database constructor is private: we only create Database objects through the getDatabase() method.

  • Method Details

    • createPreparedStatements

      private Database createPreparedStatements()
      Initializes Prepared Statements
      Returns:
      a database

    • getDatabase

      public static Database getDatabase(String host, String port, String path, String user, String pass)
      Get a fully-configured connection to the database
      Parameters:
      host - The IP address or hostname of the database server
      port - The port on the database server to which connection requests should be sent
      path - The path to use, can be null
      user - The user ID to use when connecting
      pass - The password to use when connecting
      Returns:
      A Database object, or null if we cannot connect properly

    • getDatabase

      public static Database getDatabase(String db_url, String port_default)
      Get a fully-configured connection to the database
      Parameters:
      db_url - The url to the database
      port_default - port to use if absent in db_url
      Returns:
      A Database object, or null if we cannot connect properly

    • disconnect

      boolean disconnect()
      Close the current connection to the database, if one exists. NB: The connection will always be null after this call, even if an error occurred during the closing operation.
      Returns:
      True if the connection was cleanly closed, false otherwise

    • insertRowMessage

      Integer insertRowMessage(String subject, String message, int uId)
      Insert a Message row into the database
      Parameters:
      subject - The subject for this new row
      message - The message body for this new row
      uId - The user Id associated with this new row
      Returns:
      The number of rows that were inserted

    • insertRowComment

      Integer insertRowComment(String content, int uId, int mId)
      Insert a Comment row into the database
      Parameters:
      content - The content for this new row
      uId - The user Id asscociated with this new row
      mId - The message Id asscociated with this new row
      Returns:
      The number of rows that were inserted

    • insertRowUser

      Integer insertRowUser(String name, String email, String gender, String so, String username, String note)
      Insert a User row into the database
      Parameters:
      name - The name for this new row
      email - The email for this new row
      gender - The gender for this new row
      so - The so for this new row
      username - The username for this new row
      note - The note for this new row
      Returns:
      The number of rows that were inserted

      Parameters:
      mId - The message Id asscociated with this new row
      uId - The user Id asscociated with this new row
      Returns:
      The number of rows that were inserted

    • selectAllMessages

      ArrayList<DataRowMessage> selectAllMessages(int uid)
      Query the database for a list of all Messages
      Parameters:
      uid - The uid of the user requesting
      Returns:
      All rows, as an ArrayList

    • selectAllComments

      ArrayList<DataRowComment> selectAllComments(int mId)
      Query the database for a list of all comments for a given message
      Parameters:
      mId - The message Id asscociated with this group of comments
      Returns:
      All rows, as an ArrayList

    • getCountComments

      Integer getCountComments(int mId)
      Query the database for a count of the list of all comments for a given message
      Parameters:
      mId - The message Id asscociated with this group of comments
      Returns:
      the count of comments for this post

    • selectOneMessage

      DataRowMessage selectOneMessage(int id, int uid)
      Get all data for a specific Message row, by ID
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Message row being requested
      uid - The uid of the user requesting
      Returns:
      The data for the requested Message row, or null if the ID was invalid

      uId - The uId of the UDownote row being requested
      Returns:

    • deleteRowUpvote

      Integer deleteRowUpvote(int id)
      Delete an upvote by ID
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Upvote row to delete
      Returns:
      The number of Upvote rows that were deleted. -1 indicates an error.

      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Comment row to update
      content - The new comment contents
      Returns:
      The number of Comment rows that were updated. -1 indicates an error.
